name: Beet and Pete's Car Dealer
description:
The First and Only car dealership simulator!
Do you have what it takes to grow your car dealer empire?

Now you get the chance to find out! The Beetlejuice and Medicated Pete way!

Features:
- Design and engineer new car types
- Hire and manage sales people
- Test drive your cars
- Enter the negotiation room and strike a deal
- And more!
